Digestive System Diseases/Liver Diseases/Hepatitis/Hepatitis, Viral, Human/Hepatitis A
Record.Description: INFLAMMATION of the LIVER in humans caused by a member of the HEPATOVIRUS genus, HUMAN HEPATITIS A VIRUS. It can be transmitted through fecal contamination of food or water.
